Calendars

Please subscribe to your level's calendar to stay up to date with your schedule and other important dates.

To subscribe to your level’s calendar, copy the appropriate address to use with your favourite calendar application. In Apple Calendar, for instance, go File > New Calendar Subscription… then paste provided URL. Once you’ve done so, you’ll see these options.

Notice that I’ve chosen to sync the calendar with iCloud. That means that they’ll sync with all devices using the same iCloud account.

If you need further assistance with calendars, please see me at school.
